Title: Relates to certain real property to be conveyed to the town of Huntington
Summary: Extends provisions relating to certain real property to be conveyed to the town of Huntington for one year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 431 of the laws of 2018 relating to authorizing the state commissioner of transportation to convey real property to the town of Huntington, county of Suffolk, in relation to extending certain provisions
